requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #5 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #5 API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Auction-Based Booking. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Time-based membership (10 hours/week)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.
